Key Match Events: Suriname took an early lead through Djevencio van der Kust
Guyana responded with a penalty goal from Omari Glasgow in the 43rd
Substitute Jaden Montnor made something out of nothing after slipping through the defense and releasing a shot that beat the goalkeeper on the near post in the 66th
Suriname sealed the match with a goal from Misidjan in the 83rd
Miscellaneous Highlights: Defensive errors and missed opportunities cost Guyana the match
The match was played with water breaks due to high temperatures
Suriname dominated most of the mid-field play throughout the day
